# 1. åŒé‡å¾ªç¯

åŒé‡å¾ªç¯å»é‡å®ç°æ¯”è¾ƒå®¹æ˜“

# 1.1 å®ç°ä¸€

Array.prototype.unique = function() {
  const newArray = [];
  let isRepeat;
  for (let i = 0; i < this.length; i++) {
    isRepeat = false;
    for (let j = 0; j < newArray.length; j++) {
      if (this[i] === newArray[j]) {
        isRepeat = true;
        break;
      }
    }
    if (!isRepeat) {
      newArray.push(this[i]);
    }
  }
  return newArray;
}

# 1.2 å®ç°äºŒ

Array.prototype.unique = function () {
  const newArray = [];
  let isRepeat;
  for (let i = 0; i < this.length; i++) {
    isRepeat = false;
    for (let j = i + 1; j < this.length; j++) {
      if (this[i] === this[j]) {
        isRepeat = true;
        break;
      }
    }
    if (!isRepeat) {
      newArray.push(this[i]);
    }
  }
  return newArray;
}

# 1.3 å®ç°ä¸‰

Array.prototype.unique = function () {
  const newArray = [];
  
  for (let i = 0; i < this.length; i++) {
    for (let j = i + 1; j < this.length; j++) {
      if (this[i] === this[j]) {
        j = ++i;
      }
    }
    newArray.push(this[i]);
  }
  return newArray;
}

# 2. Array.prototype.indexOf()

åŸºæœ¬æ€è·¯ï¼šå¦‚æœç´¢å¼•ä¸æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç´¢å¼•ï¼Œè¯´æ˜æ˜¯é‡å¤å€¼ã€‚

# 2.1 å®ç°ä¸€

  • åˆ©ç”¨Array.prototype.filter()è¿‡æ»¤åŠŸèƒ½
  • Array.prototype.indexOf()è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç´¢å¼•å€¼
  • åªå°†æ•°ç»„ä¸­å…ƒç´ ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡å‡ºç°çš„è¿”å›
  • ä¹‹åå‡ºç°çš„å°†è¢«è¿‡æ»¤æ‰
Array.prototype.unique = function() {
  return this.filter((item, index) => {
    return this.indexOf(item) === index
  })
}

# 2.2 å®ç°äºŒ

Array.prototype.unique = function() {
  const newArray = [];
  this.forEach(item => {
    if (newArray.indexOf(item) === -1) {
      newArray.push(item);
    }
  })
  return newArray;
}

# 3. Array.prototype.sort()

åŸºæœ¬æ€è·¯ï¼šå…ˆå¯¹åŸæ•°ç»„è¿›è¡Œæ’åºï¼Œç„¶åå†è¿›è¡Œå…ƒç´ æ¯”è¾ƒã€‚

# 3.1 å®ç°ä¸€ï¼š

Array.prototype.unique = function () {
  const newArray = [];
  this.sort();
  for (let i = 0; i < this.length; i++) {
    if (this[i] !== this[i + 1]) {
      newArray.push(this[i]);
    }
  }
  return newArray;
}

# 3.2 å®ç°äºŒ:

Array.prototype.unique = function () {
  const newArray = [];
  this.sort();
  for (let i = 0; i < this.length; i++) {
    if (this[i] !== newArray[newArray.length - 1]) {
      newArray.push(this[i]);
    }
  }
  return newArray;
}

# 4. Array.prototype.includes()

Array.prototype.unique = function () {
  const newArray = [];
  this.forEach(item => {
    if (!newArray.includes(item)) {
      newArray.push(item);
    }
  });
  return newArray;
}

# 5. Array.prototype.reduce()

Array.prototype.unique = function () {
  return this.sort().reduce((init, current) => {
    if(init.length === 0 || init[init.length - 1] !== current){
      init.push(current);
    }
    return init;
  }, []);
}

# 6. å¯¹è±¡é”®å€¼å¯¹

åŸºæœ¬æ€è·¯ï¼šåˆ©ç”¨äº†å¯¹è±¡çš„keyä¸å¯ä»¥é‡å¤çš„ç‰¹æ€§æ¥è¿›è¡Œå»é‡ã€‚

ä½†éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„ï¼š

  • æ— æ³•åŒºåˆ†éšå¼ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢æˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²åä¸€æ ·çš„å€¼ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ 1 å’Œ '1'
  • æ— æ³•å¤„ç†å¤æ‚æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆå› ä¸ºå¯¹è±¡ä½œä¸º key ä¼šå˜æˆ [object Object]ï¼‰
  • ç‰¹æ®Šæ•°æ®ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ 'proto'ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå¯¹è±¡çš„ proto å±æ€§æ— æ³•è¢«é‡å†™

# 6.1 å®ç°ä¸€ï¼š

è§£å†³ç¬¬ä¸€ã€ç¬¬ä¸‰ç‚¹é—®é¢˜

Array.prototype.unique = function () {
  const newArray = [];
  const tmp = {};
  for (let i = 0; i < this.length; i++) {
    if (!tmp[typeof this[i] + this[i]]) {
      tmp[typeof this[i] + this[i]] = 1;
      newArray.push(this[i]);
    }
  }
  return newArray;
}

# 6.2 å®ç°äºŒ

è§£å†³ç¬¬äºŒç‚¹é—®é¢˜:

Array.prototype.unique = function () {
  const newArray = [];
  const tmp = {};
  for (let i = 0; i < this.length; i++) {
    // ä½¿ç”¨JSON.stringify()è¿›è¡Œåºåˆ—åŒ–
    if (!tmp[typeof this[i] + JSON.stringify(this[i])]) {
      // å°†å¯¹è±¡åºåˆ—åŒ–ä¹‹åä½œä¸ºkeyæ¥ä½¿ç”¨
      tmp[typeof this[i] + JSON.stringify(this[i])] = 1;
      newArray.push(this[i]);
    }
  }
  return newArray;
}

# 6.3 å®ç°ä¸‰

const array = ['ğŸ‘', 1, 2, 'ğŸ‘', 'ğŸ‘', 3]
array.reduce((unique, item) => {
  unique.include(item) ? unique : [...unique, item]
}, [])

# 7. Map

# 7.1 å®ç°ä¸€

Array.prototype.unique = function () {
  const newArray = [];
  const tmp = new Map();
  for(let i = 0; i < this.length; i++){
        if(!tmp.get(this[i])){
            tmp.set(this[i], 1);
            newArray.push(this[i]);
        }
    }
    return newArray;
}

# 7.2 å®ç°äºŒï¼š

Array.prototype.unique = function () {
  const tmp = new Map();
  return this.filter(item => {
    return !tmp.has(item) && tmp.set(item, 1);
  })
}

# 8. Set

# 8.1 å®ç°ä¸€

Array.prototype.unique = function () {
  const set = new Set(this);
  return Array.from(set);
}

# 8.2 å®ç°äºŒ

Array.prototype.unique = function () {
  return [...new Set(this)];
}
